rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C90018

definition: Terminology related to the sense of awareness of self and of the environment.
name: Consciousness State

terms.definition: A level of awareness that can be described as being alert. (NCI)
A neurologic state characterized by decreased ability to perceive and respond. (NCI)
A level of awareness that can be described as varied and intermittent periods of consciousness and unconsciousness.
The neurologic status characterized by the occurrence of a loss of the ability to perceive and respond.
The state of consciousness is not controlled. The possibility exists for having multiple conscious states over a period of time. (NCI)
